channel.title: Need Help With My Pk Server(with a reward!)
channel.description:
ok....my pk server is messed up i think... i downloaded no-ip downloaded cheezscape , editted my compile accordingly and when i ran compile so i could get on my server this is what it said:
the system cannot find the path specified the system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue...
now, ive edited compile on testscape the VERY SAME WAY and it runs my server, but it doesnt work on cheezscape.anyone help??????? btw i have jdk 5.0 if that makes a difference and this is what my compile says:: [code]@echo off COLOR 08 title Somepkserverthingy Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server pause [/code] the name of my server is somepkserverthingy.no-ip.info as for the incentive....co-owner and adminship should do very well...

item.title: Need Help With My Pk Server(with a reward!)

item.description:
@pk3r0fz4mmy wrote:

dude now it says the system cannot find the path specified once. and now i changed it to flamesofice.no-ip.org

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With My Pk Server(with a reward!)
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Compile should say this

@echo off
title somepkserverthingy Compiler
“C:\program files\java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With My Pk Server(with a reward!)

item.title: Need Help With My Pk Server(with a reward!)
item.dc:creator: @pk3r0fz4mmy pk3r0fz4mmy
item.description:
@pk3r0fz4mmy wrote:

ok…my pk server is messed up i think… i downloaded no-ip downloaded cheezscape , editted my compile accordingly and when i ran compile so i could get on my server this is what it said:

the system cannot find the path specified the system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue...
now, ive edited compile on testscape the VERY SAME WAY and it runs my server, but it doesnt work on cheezscape.anyone help???????

btw i have jdk 5.0 if that makes a difference

and this is what my compile says::

@echo off COLOR 08 title Somepkserverthingy Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server pause

the name of my server is somepkserverthingy.no-ip.info

as for the incentive…co-owner and adminship should do very well…
